entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:47 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
